## Step 2: load data 
```{r}
fulldf <- readRDS("r/air_quality_sa.rds") 

# to avoid having to partition data, store redundant info, adding uniformly distributed random number
set.seed(2021)
randoms <- runif(nrow(fulldf))


fulldf <- fulldf %>%
        cbind(randoms)

rm(randoms)
```
